title: Gurman: iMac Pro brand to make a come back with M1 iMac design, improved chips
content:
In the latest edition of the Power On newsletter, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman says he expects Apple will release a rebranded iMac Pro that is “bigger than the current 24-inch” but with a similar design language.

more…

The post Gurman: iMac Pro brand to make a come back with M1 iMac design, improved chips appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: In the Power On newsletter, Mark Gurman says Apple is readying a "bigger than the current 24-inch" iMac and will be branded as the iMac Pro.
